1.Text: Approximately 3 inches of space between knee and edge of seat

2.Text: Less than 3 inches of space between knee and edge of seat

2.1.Text: More than 3 inches of space between knee and edge of seat

1.Text: Elbows supported in line with shoulders, shoulders relaxed

2.1.Text: Angled too far back (greated than 110°) or forward (less than 95°)

1.Text: Arm's length distance (40-75cm) / Screen at eye
Headset / One hand on phone & neutral neck posture

2.Text: Wrists extended / Keyboard on positive angle (>15° wrist extension)

0.Text: Worker spends 1-4 hours a day intermittently, or between 30 minutes to 1 hour continuously in the chair

-1.Text: Worker spends less than 1 hour a day in the chair throughout the day, or for less than 30 minutes consecutively

1.Text: Worker spends more than 4 hours a day in the chair intermittently, or greater than 1 hour consecutively

0.Text: Use of the monitor between 1-4 hours intermittently, or 30minutes to 1 hour consecutively

-1.Text: Use of the monitor less than 1 hour of work done per day intermittently, or less than 30 minutes consecutively

1.Text: Use of the monitor of greater than 4 hours per day intermittently, or 1 hour consecutively

0.Text: Use of the phone between 1-4 hours intermittently, or 30minutes to 1 hour consecutively

-1.Text: Use of the phone less than 1 hour of work done per day intermittently, or less than 30 minutes consecutively

1.Text: Use of the phone of greater than 4 hours per day intermittently, or 1 hour consecutively

0.Text: Keyboard is used between 1-4 hours intermittently, or 30minutes to 1 hour consecutively

-1.Text: Keyboard is used for 1 hour or less intermittently

1.Text: Keyboard is used for greater than 4 hours per day intermittently, or 1 hour consecutively

0.Text: Mouse is used between 1-4 hours intermittently, or 30minutes to 1 hour consecutively

-1.Text: Mouse is used for 1 hour or less intermittently, or less than 30 minutes consecutively

1.Text: Mouse is used for greater than 4 hours per day intermittently, or 1 hour consecutively
